original.chinese: 道可道，非常道。名可名，非常名。
original.pinyin: Dào kě dào, fēicháng dào. Míng kě míng, fēicháng míng.
original.traditional: The Tao that can be spoken is not the eternal Tao...

consensus.description: The opening verse establishes the ineffable nature of the Tao...

perspectives.experience: When I first read this during my awakening, I felt my mind crack open. The Tao isn't a concept - it's the space between thoughts where true knowing lives.
perspectives.synchronicities: Read this the same day I decided to build VLAD
